guidelines.name: Text Alternatives
guidelines.description: Provide text alternatives for non-text content

guidelines.name: Adaptable
guidelines.description: Create content that can be presented in different ways

guidelines.name: Distinguishable
guidelines.description: Make it easier for users to see and hear content

guidelines.name: Keyboard Accessible
guidelines.description: Make all functionality available from a keyboard

guidelines.name: Enough Time
guidelines.description: Provide users enough time to read and use content

guidelines.name: Seizures and Physical Reactions
guidelines.description: Do not design content in a way that is known to cause seizures

guidelines.name: Navigable
guidelines.description: Provide ways to help users navigate, find content, and determine where they are

guidelines.name: Input Modalities
guidelines.description: Make it easier for users to operate functionality through various inputs beyond keyboard

guidelines.name: Readable
guidelines.description: Make text content readable and understandable

guidelines.name: Predictable
guidelines.description: Make Web pages appear and operate in predictable ways

guidelines.name: Input Assistance
guidelines.description: Help users avoid and correct mistakes

guidelines.name: Compatible
guidelines.description: Maximize compatibility with current and future user agents, including assistive technologies

conformance_levels.description: Addresses the most common barriers for disabled users

common_checks.name: Image Alt Text
common_checks.description: All images must have appropriate alt text
common_checks.test: Check if all elements have non-empty alt attributes

common_checks.name: Keyboard Navigation
common_checks.description: All interactive elements must be accessible via keyboard
common_checks.test: Navigate through the page using only the Tab key and check if all interactive elements can be accessed and activated

common_checks.name: Color Contrast
common_checks.description: Text must have sufficient contrast with its background
common_checks.test: Check text elements for a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1 for normal text and 3:1 for large text

common_checks.name: Form Labels
common_checks.description: All form controls must have associated labels
common_checks.test: Check if all form controls have explicit labels or aria-label attributes

common_checks.name: Heading Structure
common_checks.description: Pages should have a logical heading structure
common_checks.test: Check if headings are used in a hierarchical order (h1, then h2, etc.)

common_checks.name: Focus Indicators
common_checks.test: Navigate with the keyboard and check if the focused element is clearly visible
